snippet: Larry Mize, known for his sudden-death victory over Greg Norman at the 1987 Masters, said he'd love to play all four days of the tournament this year.
abstract: Larry Mize, known for his sudden-death victory over Greg Norman at the 1987 Masters, said he'd love to play all four days of the tournament this year.

headline.main: 25 Years Down the Road, Mize Opens With a 76
